text: This is a list of all teams and players who have won the Tipperary Senior Hurling Championship since its inception in 1887. ==By team== {|class="wikitable" ! style="background:blue; color:yellow; border:1px solid black;" |# ! style="background:blue; color:yellow; border:1px solid black;" | Team ! style="background:blue; color:yellow; border:1px solid black;" | Wins ! style="background:blue; color:yellow; border:1px solid black;" | Winning Years |- | 1 | Border Thurles Sarsfields | 36 | 1887, 1904, 1906, 1907, 1908, 1909, 1911, 1929, 1935, 1936, 1938, 1939, 1942, 1944, 1945, 1946, 1952, 1955, 1956, 1957, 1958, 1959, 1961, 1962, 1963, 1964, 1965, 1974, 2005, 2009, 2010, 2012, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017 |- | 2 | Border Toomevara | 21 | 1890, 1910, 1912, 1913, 1914, 1919, 1923, 1930, 1931, 1960, 1992, 1993, 1994, 1998, 1999, 2000, 2001, 2003, 2004, 2006, 2008 |- | 3 | Border Moycarkey-Borris | 12 | 1899, 1900, 1903, 1905, 1926, 1932, 1933, 1934, 1937, 1940, 1982, 1984 |- | 4 | Border Boherlahan-Dualla | 11 | 1915, 1916, 1917, 1918, 1922, 1924, 1925, 1927, 1928, 1941, 1996 |- | rowspan=2 |5 | Border Borris-Ileigh | 6 | 1949, 1950, 1953, 1981, 1983, 1986 |- | Border Roscrea | 6 | 1968, 1969, 1970, 1972, 1973, 1980 |- | rowspan=3 |6 | Border Holycross-Ballycahill | 4 | 1948, 1951, 1954, 1990 |- | Border Kilruane MacDonaghs | 5 | 1901 (De Wets)1977, 1978, 1979, 1985 |- | Border Clonoulty-Rossmore | 4 | 1888, 1989, 1997, 2018 |- | rowspan=2 |7 | Tubberadora | 3 | 1895, 1896, 1898 |- | 25px Loughmore- Castleiney | 3 | 1988, 2007, 2013 |- | rowspan=2 |8 | 25px Carrick Davins | 2 | 1966, 1967 |- | Moneygall | 2 | 1975, 1976 |- | rowspan=12 |9 | 25px Upperchurch-Drombane | 1 | 1894 |- | Suir View | 1 | 1897 |- | Horse and Jockey | 1 | 1899 |- | Ballytrasna | 1 | 1901 |- |- | Éire Óg Annacarthy | 1 | 1943 |- | Carrick Swans | 1 | 1947 |- | Moyne-Templetuohy | 1 | 1971 |- | Cappawhite | 1 | 1987 |- | Cashel King Cormacs | 1 | 1991 |- | Nenagh Éire Óg | 1 | 1995 |- | Mullinahone | 1 | 2002 |- | Drom-Inch | 1 | 2011 |} ==By year== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" |+List of Tipperary Senior Hurling Championship winners |- !scope=col| Year !scope=col| Team !scope=col class="unsortable"| Players !scope=col class="unsortable"| Ref |- |align="center" | 2017 | Border Thurles Sarsfields | P McCormack; M Cahill, R Maher, S Maher; C Moloney, P Maher (c), S Lillis; J Maher, S Cahill; D Maher, B McCarthy, A McCormack; C Stakelum, P Bourke, L Corbett. Subs: M O’Brien, T Doyle, T Doyle, R Dwan, C Lanigan, R Purcell | |- |align="center" | 2018 | Border Clonoulty-Rossmore | D O'Dwyer; Joey O'Keeffe, C Quirke, J Ryan; E Heffernan, John O'Keeffe (c), S O'Connor; M Ryan, C Hammersley; T Butler, D Quirke, P White; F O'Keeffe, T Hammersley, C Bourke. Subs: R Heffernan, J Hammersley, T Butler. | |} ==References==
title: List of Tipperary Senior Hurling Championship winners
